name: Clash of Sultans
description:
Defend and attack, unite and betray, join players from all over the world in this real-time strategy multiplayer online RPG. Download Clash of Sultans to experience the war in the Middle Ages. A world of PVP medieval combat action in an epic war game.

Top 3 Reasons to Download Clash of Sultans:
1. Battle kingdoms in real time strategy PVP war game with thousands of players worldwide.
- Your commands can be issued to troops at any time, allowing limitless strategic possibilities. See an ally being attacked right in your realm? Send some troops to defend him, or launch a surprise counterattack on the attacker’s city. Passing the trial of never-ending revenge and conquer is the only way to become a sultan!
- Join or build up your own alliance. Allies are your key to survival. Join a powerful guild, or start one of your own. Build alliances with other sultans around the Arab world. Clash of Sultans is an online RTS MMORPG that makes your sultan dreams come true. Unite closely with your allies to make your alliance the strongest in your kingdom, wage a war to strike any enemy!
- Chat with anyone from anywhere with real-time translation! Use the Kingdom Chat, Guild Chat, or create a personalized chat group of your own!


2. Get married in Clash of Sultans. Set your guards to patrol your land.
- Fight for the beauties! Expand your territories to marry the fairest lady of that land, chat with her, send her presents for the growth of love. With her kindness and love, she will bring you benefits to enhance your power.
- Idle gameplay, patrol your land and claim the rewards without being online. Defeat the rebels and banish them to occupy the continent. Then send troops patrolling on the continent in case the rebels come back. The guards will stand day and night for you, you could just check them time from time to claim the rewards.

3. You are the King of Kings
- The foundation of a mighty army is a well-run city! Harvest your fields, collector plunder resources all over the world. Upgrade buildings, research Tech and train your massive troops.
- Mighty troops are waiting for your order, train Cavalry, Infantry, Ranged Unit, or Siege Engine with your strategy of formation, the victory shall be yours!


Download Clash of Sultans, wage your war, conquer the world, take control of the realm in this epic MMO RPG war game!
